verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:1
verses.text: These are the sons of Israel; Reuben, Simeon, Levi, and Judah, Issachar, and Zebulun,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:2
verses.text: Dan, Joseph, and Benjamin, Naphtali, Gad, and Asher.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:3
verses.text: The sons of Judah; Er, and Onan, and Shelah: which three were born unto him of the daughter of Shua the Canaanitess. And Er, the firstborn of Judah, was evil in the sight of the Lord; and he slew him.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:4
verses.text: And Tamar his daughter in law bare him Pharez and Zerah. All the sons of Judah were five.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:5
verses.text: The sons of Pharez; Hezron, and Hamul.
